name: MAXAB B.V.
description: Developer of a logistic application designed to connect food and grocery retailers to suppliers. The company's application re-engineers the informal grocery and food market using technology to fit the needs of retailers, reducing costs, time, and effort, enabling retailers to manage procurement and grocery delivery to shops.
one_liner: Developer of a logistic application designed to connect food and grocery retailers to suppliers. The company's application re-engineers the informal grocery and food market using technology to fit the needs of retailers, reducing costs, time, and effort, enabling retailers to manage procurement and grocery delivery to shops.
